isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - 18 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS EATON RTLO-14618 AND RTLO-16618 SERIES - CHANGING THE INPUT SHAFT - DISASSEMBLY

step1.para: Remove the gear shift lever housing assembly (or remote control assembly) from shifter housing, and the shifter housing assembly from the transmission case.
Remove the front bearing cover and gasket. If necessary, remove the O-ring from the cover of models so equipped.
Remove the bearing retaining snap ring from the shaft groove.

Push down on the input shaft to cock the bearing in the bore. Drive the input shaft toward the transmission rear through the bearing as far as possible. Pull the input shaft forward to expose the bearing snap ring.
Use pry bars or screwdrivers to complete removing the bearing.
Remove the drive gear spacer and the snap ring.
Pull the input shaft forward and out of the drive gear and case.
